subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga saluted the home crowd after outlasting Kei Nishikori to advance to the French Open semifinals, where he will meet Stan Wawrinka, a victor over Roger Federer.
snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga saluted the home crowd after outlasting Kei Nishikori to advance to the French Open semifinals, where he will meet Stan Wawrinka, a victor over Roger Federer.
